title: Help a new player
body: I just started today and love this game. I was always skeptical of this game but I cant stop playing. I would love if anyone could leave tips, send me a gift in the game or even join me for a game. my summoner name is Foxcept (I absolutly adore foxes). Anyways post in the forums I ur confused wanna play or just bored maybe we can start a discord server eventually ill start youtube if u want join on that to my email is -----------@gmail.com

replies.body: I would add you, but I sadly got ban (2 weeks) for the first time. Not something I'm proud of.
